author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

A step to make a 2018 scenario working for dd4hep. The naming of the scenarios were discussed in the SIM meeting dated April 22 and these will be implemented in the subsequent PR for 2018 scenarios.

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows and workflows in the test/python area

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run2-gex129 A step to make a 2018 scenario working for dd4hep
